messages.subject: Something old, something new
messages.msgSnippet: A chat-style interview was published yesterday that has been mostly unavailable for ten years. http://homeschoolrealm.com/sandra-dodd/ I was interviewed a few
messages.messageBody:
A chat-style interview was published yesterday that has been mostly unavailable for ten years.
http://homeschoolrealm.com/sandra-dodd/

I was interviewed a few weeks ago for a podcast that will be released August 15 (a Tuesday), by Rebecca Bohman at The Luminous Mind.
http://www.theluminousmind.net

I’ll try to remember to bring a link here when it’s out.

Interestingly, I told a few of the same stories in both. It’s because people ask the same old questions too often. :-)

So… one old one, to read, and a new one coming in a month, to listen to.

There’s also a series of short and fun unschooling stories linked on my blog (my poor too-little-used blog, which has some of my favorite photos being collected there in a couple of recent posts).

"Jessica Hughes has a series of posts on a new site called Steemit, about unschooling. They're interesting, and I want to save them in one place for my own benefit and to let others go exploring! Language warning (the four-letter kind) but artistry promise (flowing prose and some fun little stories)."
http://sandradodd.blogspot.com/2017/07/an-unschooling-journey.html

Sandra
